html_content.title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in HTML Content
html_content.description: User input is reflected directly into the HTML body without proper sanitization
html_content.attack_vector: Direct script injection in HTML content
html_content.remediation: Use HTML entity encoding and Content Security Policy

html_attribute.title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in HTML Attributes
html_attribute.description: User input is reflected in HTML tag attributes
html_attribute.attack_vector: Attribute injection and event handler exploitation
html_attribute.remediation: Validate and encode all attribute values

javascript_context.title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in JavaScript Context
javascript_context.description: User input is injected directly into JavaScript code
javascript_context.attack_vector: Direct code execution in JavaScript context
javascript_context.remediation: Use JSON serialization and avoid eval

websocket_xss.title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in WebSocket Context
websocket_xss.description: User input is reflected in WebSocket messages

service_worker_xss.title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in Service Worker Context
service_worker_xss.description: User input is reflected in Service Worker scripts

webrtc_xss.title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in WebRTC Context
webrtc_xss.description: User input is reflected in WebRTC data channels

graphql_xss.title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in GraphQL Context
graphql_xss.description: User input is reflected in GraphQL queries

shadow_dom_xss.title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in Shadow DOM Context
shadow_dom_xss.description: User input is reflected in Shadow DOM elements

custom_elements_xss.title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in Custom Elements Context
custom_elements_xss.description: User input is reflected in custom element definitions
custom_elements_xss.remediation: Validate custom element names and attributes
